note.p: Death: Russell Place, Fitzroy Square, London (31 January 1823)
Education: Trinity College, Cambridge (admitted 1771), migrated to Magdalene College, Cambridge (1775). BA (1775); MA (1778)
Career: Called to the Bar (1779); ordained Deacon at Gloucester (1779); ordained priest at Peterborough (1781); vicar of Finchingfield, Essex (1782-1810)
Notes: Venn gives death date as 01 December 1822
